about_the_game:
The Shell of a King Demo is identical to the full game, but with about 2/3 of the map locked off. 100% of demo progression will carry over to the main game, including Steam Achievements. Steam Cloud is disabled in the Demo, but enabled by default in the full game.

The world crumbles, as it yearns for the presence of the old gods. Only the strongest and most depraved beings remain. Imprisoned beneath the first castle, can you fight your way to the surface?

Shell of a King is a top-down 2D bullet-hell RPG with an emphasis on tough boss fights, an original soundtrack, and an interconnected world to explore. A passion-project by a solo dev.

Game Features

  • Top-down bullet-hell action

  • Simple responsive controls

  • Many tough boss fights

  • A variety of enemies to face

  • Level-system and build customization

  • A non-linear style interconnected world to explore how you like!

content_descriptors.notes: There is no sexual content/themes of any kind. There are no mentions of drug/alcohol abuse. There are no depictions of suicide or self-harm. Mature themes arise from a fictional post-war setting and cartoon violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700KF or AMD Ryzen 9 3900XT
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Test your strength in Shell of a King! A precision bullet-hell adventure that will push your dodging skills to the limit. Challenge tough bosses, uncover secrets, and explore a world left to ruin in this top-down RPG Demo.
